Question: What are the public consequences of getting a restraining order against you?
When someone has a restraining order issued against them, it can have several public and personal consequences, some of which may significantly
affect their life and activities. Here's a general overview of potential public consequences:
Sent:02/16/2024 at 07:37 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/16/2024 at 07:48 PM)
Subject:Consequences of the RO you Filed on Me

When someone has a restraining order issued against them, it will have several public and personal consequences, some of which may significantly
affect their future life and activities.
Here's a general overview of the consequences:

employers conduct background checks they will view the restraining order as a serious negative character reference. Professions involving trust and
security (like teaching, law enforcement, information technology, or positions that require security clearances), will be particularly impacted.

them, fearing potential legal issues or disturbances.

A restraining order could negatively impact these opportunities.

will view you differently based on the existence of the order, which can lead to social isolation or difficulties in personal relationships.

professions require the use of firearms or individuals who hunt or participate in shooting sports.

mobility. This might include common areas like a shared workplace, school, or even shared children's locations in cases of domestic issues.

visitation rights with children.

about you and why you have the order placed on you.

may affect the ability to obtain professional licenses in the first place.
Question: That sounds really terrible for someone who has one filed against them. Are the details of the restraining order public so anyone can find
them? Example: If my wife said that likely to physically assault her and my kids would someone be able to see that?
The details of a restraining order, including any reasons for its issuance and the specific restrictions it imposes, are a matter of public record for anyone
to see. This means that the information contained within the restraining order, such as allegations of expected physical violence towards a spouse and
children, are fully accessible to the public at large. Here are some exceptions:

restraining orders to be public records, the ease with which someone can access these records can vary but most make these records searchable and
available online.

individuals to search for and find details of restraining orders, who they were filed by and against, and the reasons for filing the restraining order.

overarching details of the order will be public, but the names of minors could be redacted or otherwise protected.
Individuals concerned about the privacy of their information in legal documents like restraining orders should consult with a legal professional to
understand the specifics of their situation. The long-term negative consequences of a restraining order on the restricted person are not to be
understated. They have lifelong, enduring and very public consequence to the restrained person.

And when push comes to shove, we would need to be able to prove that, right? Making false allegations to obtain an RO is a really big deal in custody

That is why I have been asking over and over, week after week, to pull that shit back. We have discussed many times and you agreed. But then you
went to Anna Lisa and doubled down. Then proclaimed “Inal in charge Robert” I wondered why on earth you would do that when we could
peacefully resolve, but you specifically insisted on saying that crap.
At the end of the day, if you say it, you have to prove it. There is nothing to fight about. I tried to let us both back off this crazy escalation, you seemed
to agree all week and then on Friday someone else joins the party. That is why I want to talk! This stuff is bat shit crazy, and someone will find out I
don’t beat you all at some point. Because it never happened.
Your call. You said. You will prove it.

And I’m not making you laugh till you pee yourself as we hold hands on our way to make passionate love. Now my Saturday nights are spent alone.
My wife left me. I’m not allowed to see my kids. So here I sit.
And this is what I do now. I order a vase, some string, a few kinds of pampas (had never even heard of that before) and eucalyptus stems. I slowly put
them together in a way I like. It’s dumb, but gives me joy.
I have to find pleasure in solitude. This is not what I want but after 25 years, life threw me a curve ball. I’ll never be given a chance to make it right. It
hurts so deep. But I will find little things to make me smile.
Hope you are able to find joy as well... I always have.

I didn’t have a clue. This woman looked like she was the happiest I’d ever seen her. Everything she had asked me to become was happening, at last. I
was changing into the man she asked for. The man she deserved. And I loved every minute of it.
This was just before we had the most passionate intimacy since she was 18. Hot and sweaty in Corona Towers. But now it meant so much more. Our
love had grown for almost three decades together. And it was magic. Surely I could trust that smile.
She was my soulmate after all..

And I did not note her alarm. I know you two secretly met as you confirmed and she denied, but I was not involved in that. So I have no way of
judging her reaction to one side of an easy solved riddle.
I have zero idea what the “eyes wide open” comment means. Is this for our 25 year marriage? Or Is it for the cams that did not exist but were sent to
me? Or the impossible reconnect that you see the TVs do too?
You still did not answer the single most and original question I sent.two days and roughly eight hours ago. I have approval to see Adrian from Dr
Brown. That was your requirement. So how do I see him now?
You also completely skipped the question about doing as Dr Brown had asked us to do and you committed to last week. So we begin to work more
peacefully and constructively together again.
And as you consider how I downplayed things in my past, do you think you might have downplayed your affair with Kevin? It was worth flat out
lying about to your husband’s face. Did you downplay that at all?
As you reply, may I ask you to save the extra words as I do for you. Also please answer the questions. If this is the only format you will permit, it will
do us good if you can show even the most primitive attempt here.
Given the “emergency” exception noted, how do I get in touch in that case? You plan to stick to this I see, and say I beat you and my kids (the truth
will come out) but I don’t know how to reach you, right?

Message 1519 of 4024
Also- below is exactly what we agreed to do with Dr Brown. That is what I keep asking you. You keep saying she is going to do as we asked, over and
over you say that. But then you say she is going to adjust the Parenting Plan. That's not what we asked. That was one very small part of this that may
or may not be necessary. It makes me feel like you think I am so fucking stupid that I don't understand. I can read two things and see if they are or are
not alike. Adrian can do that.

Here is what we have agreed to:
Goal: Get advice from Dr Brown on moving forward with reunification in the best interest of AD, Mom, and Dad. This includes what we should
have done differently.
Scope: Adrian should explain what he saw, express any concerns that arose from that, and allow for Mom and Dad to offer their perspectives on the
way we handled it.
